divs: sighting detailsi have to check the year with friends who observed this. all of us have advanced degrees (masters\ph.d.s). i know it was a full mooon in august that evening.
Summary: Hovered star-like on horizon near Wawawaii/Snake River - many witnesses saw it hovering low on horizon all evening; then it disappeared faster than imaginable into the night sky with a bright flash of light.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Pullman
There were no other sightings in Pullman on or around August 7th 1990
